hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
DECLARE @CommunityId_oe varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_oe varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_oe = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_oe = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec COM_OptionExclusions_sel @CommunityId = CommunityId_oe
